snippet.title: steam trailer
snippet.description:
Your ship crash landed, shipwreck, and you must find a way to repair your ship to leave. It is a building game where you must feed your colonists, protect, and survive.

Been updating the trailer a bit.

This is the early access to the game if people enjoy the game I plan on adding new features to the game.

you can play the demo or purchase the game here: https://shmellyorc.itch.io/shipwreck
